item.description:
Steelers Vs Cardinals! This should be a great game, and even if you’re not a football fan, it's great way for us to get together on a Superbowl Sunday and have some fun (and pound some watery American brewskis). I'll be posting this event on a couple other group's pages, so there will be lots of new faces there also.

The Four's is located across from the TD Banknorth Garden close to the North Station T Stop. Voted #1 Sports Bar in America by Sports Illustrated. Award winning buffalo wings and hall-of-fame sandwiches are piled high.

The Four's
166 Canal Street
Boston, MA 02114
617-720-4455
http://www.thefours.c...
item.how_to_find_us: Details will be sent to Yes RSVPs closer to date
item.name: Superbowl XLIII !
